reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Blake is an amazing professor! She explains complex topics very clearly and is always available for help.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Great teacher with a lot of knowledge, but sometimes the lectures move too quickly.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is knowledgeable, but her lectures can be a bit dry. The exams are challenging but fair.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Lee makes history come alive. His classes are engaging, but the reading load is heavy.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: The material is interesting, but Dr. Smith's lectures are hard to follow and she rarely answers emails.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Davis is one of the best. He makes physics understandable and fun. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Brown is very knowledgeable, but her exams are tough. You need to study hard to do well.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Interesting discussions, but the grading is harsh. Make sure to participate in class.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson is fantastic! Her classes are well-structured and she provides great real-world examples.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Prof. Clark is passionate about the subject. The class is interesting, but there's a lot of writing involved.

reviews.subject: Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor's classes are a delight. She's very approachable and the reading list is excellent.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: The class was okay, but I wish Prof. White was more engaging. The material can be dry at times.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson knows his stuff, but the assignments are tough. Be prepared to put in the work.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Prof. Martinez is incredibly inspiring. His passion for the environment is contagious.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: The subject is interesting, but Dr. Anderson's lectures are monotonous. It's hard to stay awake.

reviews.subject: Law
reviews.review: Prof. Robinson is tough but fair. His classes are challenging, but you learn a lot.

reviews.subject: Music
reviews.review: Dr. King is wonderful! Her enthusiasm for music is infectious, and the class is a joy.

reviews.subject: Theater
reviews.review: The class was okay, but I expected more hands-on experience. Prof. Lewis is knowledgeable, though.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Hall is very engaging and makes the material interesting. The exams are fair but require a lot of study.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Statistics is tough, and Prof. Walker doesn't do much to make it easier. The lectures are confusing.
